name: Let Me Out (itch) (LeeJuke)
description:
USE FULLSCREEN

The game is about a capacitor who wants to charge as high as possible.

You need to solve simple puzzles, gather charge and avoid getting grounded.

The general goal is to use the antenas to teleport between levels and gather all the charges (lightning symbols)

Tips for movement, in case you don't understand my pictograms.

You need to use "A" and "D" to move left and right.

You can jump by hitting the space bar. If you hold it you can jump a little higher.

If you are touching a wall and falling, you slowly slide down the wall.

While sliding you can move towards the wall and jump, this will make you jump higher up the wall.

While sliding you can move away from the wall and jump, this will make you jump horizontaly from the wall.

If you are on the correct type of platform you can hit the "S" key to go through the platform.

Known scuff: the antenas don't work perfectly, if they won't teleport you, walk away a bit and again through them.

Music by: https://www.youtube.com/@simplesamples6577/videos

Sound effects from: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/slide/
